author: timbeiko
content: FYI it seems like Danno from Besu (`@shemnon` | `_shemnon`)'s Discord account was compromised --- kicked him out of the discord for now as a precaution, but please exercise caution if receiving a message from him now. Will share an update once it's fixed.

author: timbeiko
content: And it's fixed, confirmed over zoom with him and re-invited him to the discord. The issue was caused by a captcha bot from one of the spam accounts on this server. Please be careful when following links outside this discord!
